issue.title: [CF 197] arcane missiles/ABar conditions?
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

i want to use TMW to set up a pop up so i know when the proper conditions have been met to use arcane missiles and arcane barrage but cant figure out the right conditions to use.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. reactive ability 5143
2. conditions: buff stacks ... player... >= ... 3stacks of 36032
3.  without the conditions i can see when arcane missiles proc. with the conditions i get nothing

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
i expect to see TMW flash an icon saying i can use AM or ABar after casting AB 4 times or more

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.1.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no

Please provide any additional information below.
what are the proper parameters to get said function to function?


> Posted by CurseForge user goarbash | Imported from CurseForge issue #197 | Raw

comments.body:
Arcane blast is a debuff on you, not a buff.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

that totaly worked!!! i never would have thought AB was a debuff but i can see that now in a way. THANK U!!!!!!!!!!!!


> Posted by CurseForge user goarbash
